summary:
Thunder Peris,
A Standalone Two-handed ThunderAxe Follower.
descriptionHtml:
[left]﻿[/left]Thunder Peris:A  Standalone Two-handed ThunderAxe Follower.
Peris was the most powerful two-handed axe warrior in Tamriel and she was also the best block master. As a nord, Peris was a true believer of talos. She was sentenced to life imprisonment for it and put in Helgen jail. She was so angry that the thunder and bloodlust exploded. One day, a huge drangon named Alduin razed the  Helgen, she escaped from prison to the Riverwood. The town was  beautiful, and everyone was amiable and leisurely , which was the life she had long been yearing for. Athene heard Whiterun Lord could tolerate the nagging Heimskr to deliver sermons about Talos and the town of Riverwood was Whiterun territory, so she decided to stay and help the town assault against bandits, vampires and dragon.

Body:UNP  
Level:2-300（1.2rate）
Location: Sleeping Giant Inn
Voice:Female Young Eager
Height/weight:1.0/100
Combatstyle :preferring heavy armor and two-handed Axe,  crossbow.
Essential, Marriageable
 
Peris have a preference for her prison clothes, and had better change the clothes before you give her new dress.   Recommend AFT set management.
You can improve the ThunderAxe. 

CreationKit1.9.32
Please post your screenshot !
author: aniua
